channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Yes, I used the search tool....for all of them
I have a few problems with my server, if someone can help me with any id be grateful
1) I made a shop, but the shopkeeper wont trade me.
2) I tried making another shop, but it didn't work -.-
3) Admins cant drop or trade other people
4) Need help making commands
5)Silab item ID List (i found links to one website but none of them work...

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Still, now why wont the NPC Trade me?

And what exactly do i change for admins to be able to drop items?

What file do i insert that code u posted about 3 posts back because i looked in client.java and npc.handler and i didnt find anything like that

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

NPCHandler.Java for dialogue, Autospawn for adding NPC’s.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Where to insert that code in Tony…client.java?

and what do i search for first to know where to insert it

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Well, there’s always more than 1 NPC option.
Ex: Right clicking an NPC, you see ‘Trade’ and ‘Talk to’ <- those are NPC options.

Command for teleporting:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Command name")) {
if (teleblock == true) {
sendMessage("TeleBlock message.."); 
} else {
teleportToX = XXXX;
teleportToY = YYYY;
		heightLevel = 0;
		updateRequired = true;
		appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage("Message to be sent");

}

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

[quote=“tonypker13, post:3, topic:242755”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=319076.msg2528815#msg2528815 date=1226353780]

Yes, I used the search tool…for all of them

I have a few problems with my server, if someone can help me with any id be grateful

  1. I made a shop, but the shopkeeper wont trade me.

  2. I tried making another shop, but it didn’t work -.-

  3. Admins cant drop or trade other people

If you want to get on my server its ic3barrag3scape.no-ip.biz, but its not coded for silab its coded for my source so most items are nulls
4) Need help making commands

5)Silab item ID List (i found links to one website but none of them work…

i no then, 3) Admins cant drop or trade other people bit,
goto client.java in ur server files,
then goto - if(other.playerRights == 5){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);

change the 0 to —> 5
[/quote]
Completely wrong on every basis.

Answers:

  1. You may have 2 npc options, performing on the wrong option.
  2. You could have made it completely wrong. Try a new NPC id.
  3. Your trading is set to player rights 1 or below. Change it.
  4. What kind of commands?
  5. My rare files download has the list.[/quote]

What do you mean by performing ont he wrong option??

The NPC ID is taken straight from my config folder, but ill look into it

How to change the rights? Post me a tut?

Commands such as ::shops or ::pk

Can you send me the list??

Read full topic

I have a few problems with my server, if someone can help me with any id be grateful

  2. I tried making another shop, but it didn’t work -.-

  3. Admins cant drop or trade other people

  4. Need help making commands

5)Silab item ID List (i found links to one website but none of them work…
[/quote]

i no then, 3) Admins cant drop or trade other people bit,
goto client.java in ur server files,
then goto - if(other.playerRights == 5){
sM(“Admins cannot trade.”);

change the 0 to —> 5[/quote]
Completely wrong on every basis.

Answers:

  1. You may have 2 npc options, performing on the wrong option.
  2. You could have made it completely wrong. Try a new NPC id.
  3. Your trading is set to player rights 1 or below. Change it.
  4. What kind of commands?
  5. My rare files download has the list.
